body:
I am afraid you will need to depend on runfiles, and nothing else for a test that we want to run in an automated way. Because the way we are using bazel is, your test is only guaranteed to have full access to runfiles, and it "won't" have access to the original source tree.
And also, I would recommend going through resource loader. This is because the runfiles location/structure may change. We will maintain resource_loader ourselves to ensure it will keep working the same way it did work before.
If you do not use resource_loader, it is just a 2nd place to maintain this logic. It will be brittle, as runfiles is managed by bazel, and bazel is still not 1.0.
